騷.definition: (bound form) to disturb; to disrupt; flirty; coquettish; abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]; (literary) literary writings; poetry; foul-smelling (variant of 臊[sao1]); (dialect) (of certain domestic animals) male

騷亂.definition: disturbance; riot; to create a disturbance

騷動.definition: disturbance; uproar; CL:陣|阵[zhen4]; to become restless

騷包.definition: (slang) alluring; showy; flashy and enticing person; painted Jezebel

騷擾.definition: to disturb; to cause a commotion; to harass

騷體.definition: poetry in the style of 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]
